ModMetaData.name: Spidercamp's Dog Pack Retextured
ModMetaData.author: HalituisAmaricanous
ModMetaData.description:
This mod replaces, "Spidercamps's Dog pack mod" with alternate textures for dogs! requires the original mod, or Mlie's resurrected mod "Spidercamp's Dog Pack (Continued)" to work.
Mod Replaces / Adds 75 Unique sprites.
CREDITS
♦ Spidercamps : For Creating the original mod ♦ Mlie : For Creating the continuation mod ♦ Halituis Amaricanous : Retexture ♦ And you : for playing
